content: this legal text explains the progress of a cause involving an inheritance case the court made a decision on january 33 2023 regarding the cost procedure the total cost of the procedure is 1332 euros which is divided equally among the three heirs involved the procedure lasted from january 25 2021 to january 31 2022 the final resolution of the case involves the distribution of various assets including real estate funds in a bank account a limited liability company and material copyrights each heir receives a different portion of the assets based on agreements between them the decision was based on the inheritance act and the agreement between the parties the court also determined the specific details of the deceased persons estate including two real estate properties a bank account a limited liability company and material copyrights the mother inherits half of the assets while the two brothers each inherit a quarter other heirs have also accepted their share of the inheritance the text also mentions an inheritance agreement court settlement involving one person referred to as xxx this person will inherit a coownership share of two real estate properties a limited liability company a building and a coownership share of movable property the agreement also includes provisions for the care of their mother and the burial and care of her grave the parties involved have signed the agreement voluntarily and waived any future claims or disputes the text further explains the process of filing an appeal in a legal case including the time frame required documents and payment of court fees the date of the text is january 23 2023

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, company shares, material copyrights
